snippet: A canny manipulator of the press, the software pioneer John McAfee teased many a reporter to his Central American lairs only to spin tales that were surreal and often unverifiable.
abstract: John McAfee, fugitive tech millionaire who is expected to be extradited to Belize for questioning in a neighbor's murder, has long been a canny manipulator of the press; McAfee's taste for spotlight became his undoing when metadata for a photo in Vice magazine inadvertently revealed his location in Guatemala.
lead_paragraph: A canny manipulator of the press, the software pioneer John McAfee teased many a reporter to his Central American lairs only to spin tales that were surreal and often unverifiable.
